poem_en: Carl was congested- not such a bad thing, but he didn’t just have a heart; he was one. While some try, he lived his whole life with it, not just on his sleeve. It was terminal, you see: he missed a flight. She was on it; there was no catching up. Skipped a beat, without him even noticing.
poem_it: Carl era afflitto da congestione - non una cosa così terribile, ma non aveva solo un cuore; lui era un cuore. Mentre alcuni ci provano, lui ha vissuto la sua intera vita avendolo, non solo in tasca. Era terminale, capisci: ha perso un volo. Lei era a bordo; non c'era modo di raggiungerla. Ha perso un battito, senza nemmeno accorgersene.
